title: INTRODUCTION TO OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section outlines the scope of the Agreement and the Services provided by Apple.

title: USING OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section discusses the payments and transaction processes for acquiring content through Apple's Services.

title: PAYMENTS, TAXES AND REFUNDS
Purpose: This section details the payment methods, transaction processes, and refund policies for content acquired through Apple's Services.

title: ACCOUNT
Purpose: This section describes the requirements for creating and maintaining an Apple ID and account security.

title: PRIVACY
Purpose: This section states that the use of Apple's Services is subject to Apple's Privacy Policy.

title: SERVICES AND CONTENT USAGE RULES
Purpose: This section sets forth the rules and guidelines for using Apple's Services and Content.

title: DOWNLOADS
Purpose: This section explains the limitations and conditions regarding the downloading and redownloading of content.

title: SUBSCRIPTIONS
Purpose: This section describes the terms and conditions related to subscription services offered by Apple.

title: CONTENT AND SERVICE AVAILABILITY
Purpose: This section clarifies the availability of Services and Content in different regions and circumstances.

title: YOUR SUBMISSIONS TO OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section outlines the rules for submitting materials and content to Apple's Services.

title: FAMILY SHARING
Purpose: This section describes the Family Sharing feature, allowing sharing of subscriptions among family members.

title: SERIES PASS AND MULTI-PASS
Purpose: This section explains the terms for purchasing television Content via Series Passes and Multi-Passes.

title: ADDITIONAL APP STORE TERMS (EXCLUDING APPLE ARCADE APPS)
Purpose: This section provides additional terms specific to the App Store excluding Apple Arcade apps.

title: LICENSE OF APP STORE CONTENT
Purpose: This section discusses the licensing agreements for Apps available on the App Store.

title: IN-APP PURCHASES
Purpose: This section details the rules regarding in-app purchases within Apps available on Apple's platform.

title: APP MAINTENANCE AND SUPPORT
Purpose: This section clarifies the responsibilities of Apple and App Providers regarding App maintenance and support.

title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
Purpose: This section outlines the ownership and protection of Apple's intellectual property.

title: TERMINATION AND SUSPENSION OF SERVICES
Purpose: This section describes the conditions under which Apple may terminate or suspend Services.

title: DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIABILITY LIMITATIONS
Purpose: This section outlines Apple's limitations of liability and disclaimers regarding the services provided.

title: STATUTORY EXCEPTIONS FOR PUBLIC INSTITUTIONS
Purpose: This section addresses the applicability of the agreement to public institutions and the enforceability of its terms.

title: GOVERNING LAW
Purpose: This section specifies the governing laws and jurisdiction applicable to the agreement.

title: OTHER PROVISIONS
Purpose: This section details additional terms and conditions that govern the agreement and its enforceability.
